description: Researched and added etymology sections to around 340 villages. Also increased the archive's number of villages from 350 to contain 365.
Added and consolidated villages to better reflect reality. There are now 350 distinct villages in the archive.
Added foundational data to hundreds of village files.
Added an Infographics section. Check it out to the left! (Or above on phones)
Massive Update of approximately 4x more data, and slight changes to the site.
The archive is now online. Welcome!
